name: T - Nicole Noah
_source: speak;Nicole; Oh, Mister Noah, you scared the daylights out of my poor lil' heart.
speak;Noah; I'm sorry. I didn't mean to give you a scare.{w} I only meant to ask if you'd been hurt by these brigands.
speak;Nicole; Don't worry about me.{w} I can take a beatin' and keep goin' 'til the cows come home.{w} It's the poor little girls in battle that I'm worried about.
speak;Noah; I don't like my daughters in battle, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} It's better to keep them where I can see them.
speak;Nicole; I was wonderin' when you were gonna let the youngins fly out of the nest.
speak;Noah; Oh, I know Layla wants to go out and make a difference in the world, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I don't think I'm ready to let them go just yet.
speak;Nicole; I get whatcha mean, but you can't keep 'em home forever.
speak;Noah; Say, who are you and Carson fighting alongside, anyway?{w} Who are these strangers?
speak;Nicole; Oh, they're just travelers who wanted to help
speak;Noah; Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Maybe we can drive them back after all{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; H-Hey, don't go changin' the conversation, now!{w} You gotta let those girls go someday.
speak;Noah; We can find a better time and place to talk about my parenting.
